meanings.definition: Any of a class of proteins that occur in plasma and are combined with lipids to form lipoproteins.
meanings.sent1: The apolipoprotein helps in forming lipoproteins in the blood.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the role of apolipoproteins in cholesterol transport.
meanings.sent3: The apolipoprotein threw a party with the lipids to celebrate their union.
meanings.sent4: The apolipoprotein acted like a glue, binding the lipids together to create lipoproteins.
meanings.sent5: In the body, apolipoproteins act as carriers, transporting fats through the bloodstream.
